title: Berberine 'Nature’s Ozempic' 2025 Warning: FDA Issues Urgent Alert Over Contaminated Supplements
shortdescription: The viral TikTok weight-loss hack is now linked to liver failure and heavy metal poisoning.
author: Health Guru

content.content: The TikTok Miracle Just Turned Toxic
The FDA has issued an urgent Class I recall on over 40 berberine supplement brands after third-party testing revealed dangerous levels of lead, arsenic, and bacterial contamination.
Multiple cases of acute liver failure have been directly linked to high-dose berberine use. Doctors are now warning: “It’s not ‘Nature’s Ozempic’ — it’s unregulated Russian roulette.”
